params.name: ingestURL
params.desc: an URL for CSV content e.g. http://lincs.hms.harvard.edu/db/datasets/?search=&output_type=.csv

params.name: headerLine
params.desc: The line number for the line containing the header columns

params.name: delimiter
params.desc: The character that delimits the fields in a line

params.name: useCache
params.desc: If set true and cached data exists from previous ingestion that will be used
